author: James Biggom
title: James Biggom
text: Make sure you have a good understanding about annuities and the amount of taxes that should be taken at end the tax year. Upon learning when I file taxes for tax year 2015. I owe The IRS $ 21,000 plus penalties and. I Tried to make payments of $310.00. I knew I could not keep paying, living on a fix income social security . Then I heard a radio announcement about Optima Tax Relief,made call spoke with Mr. Fredrick Bernard, a few questions to see if I qualified for the program. Next Geralyn Constantino,follow up with questions about my annuities which I didn't have anymore. Even though the IRS keep saying I still have $120,000 to pay back taxes for 2014. Then there was Enrique Arreguin and Branden Silvia who help with my offers in compromise.Which was finally accepted by IRS for $1,123.00 on January 6th, 2017. Optima's team really expressed strong feelings for my case and reassured me they would get best offer and they did. I would truly recommend Optima Tax Relief.
